rules_text:
As Simulation Manager enters, mark two of its conditions with simulation markers.
Each player’s turn consists of–
The untap step.             □ The upkeep step.
□ The draw step.           □ The precombat main phase.
□ The combat phase.     □ The postcombat main phase.
And the end phase.
{0}: Mark or unmark one of Simulation Manager’s conditions. Any player may activate this ability once during each of their turns.
notes:
Inspiration — Matrix, life is a simulation/machine

Mechanical Uniqueness — Markers and check boxes, turn manipulation.
